Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Ashburn in 1987...
Traded from Ashburn to Boston (FBA) on 2/5/1987 (Going to Ash: RF J. Riddle. Going to SHP: CF B. Wyatt)...
Had first career hit on 4/7/1987, off Ronald White (SYR)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/28/1987, off Barton Clatterbuck (CC)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Centerfield in 1987...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Centerfield in 1988...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Capital City on 10/1/1989...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Centerfield in 1989...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against New Jersey on 4/15/1990...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Troy on 4/19/1990...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1990, hitting .625 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1990, hitting .600 with 1 HR, 3 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1991, hitting .423 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Injured on 5/16/1991 with a Jammed Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1991, hitting .481 with 3 HR, 13 RBI...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
